channel.title: Azure AI Foundry Model Updates
channel.description: Latest updates on Azure AI Foundry models sold directly by Azure

item.title: gpt-5.2-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model optimized for coding workflows, including Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension. It supports both Chat Completions and Responses APIs with structured outputs, multimodal (text+image) processing, and advanced tool/function calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.2
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model for general-purpose chat and responses workloads. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, text+image processing, and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.2-chat
item.description: A GPT-5.2 chat model offered as a preview. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs with structured outputs and tool/function calling (including parallel tool calls), but preview models are not recommended for production.

item.title: gpt-5.1
item.description: A GPT-5.1-series reasoning model for advanced text and image understanding with tool use. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.1-chat
item.description: A GPT-5.1 chat model in preview with built-in reasoning capabilities. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs with structured outputs and tool/function calling, and it does not support parameters like temperature.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model intended for coding and agentic tool use via the Responses API only. It supports structured outputs, text+image processing, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model for coding workflows via the Responses API only. It supports structured outputs, text+image processing, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-max
item.description: A GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model variant for coding via the Responses API only. It adds support for setting reasoning_effort to xhigh, and does not support reasoning_effort=none.

item.title: gpt-5
item.description: A GPT-5-series reasoning model supporting both Chat Completions and Responses APIs. It provides structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls for complex tasks.

item.title: gpt-5-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5-series reasoning model designed for lower cost and faster inference while retaining tool use and multimodal capabilities. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, and parallel tool calling.

item.title: gpt-5-nano
item.description: A compact GPT-5-series reasoning model intended for efficiency-sensitive workloads. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, text+image processing, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-chat
item.description: A GPT-5 chat model offered in preview, supporting text and image input with text-only output. Version 2025-10-03 adds a significant enhancement focused on emotional intelligence and mental health capabilities for more nuanced and responsible responses.

item.title: gpt-5-codex
item.description: A GPT-5 Codex-optimized model for coding workflows via the Responses API only. It supports structured outputs, text+image processing, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension.

item.title: gpt-5-pro
item.description: A GPT-5-series reasoning model available via the Responses API, designed for high-capability reasoning with tool use. It supports structured outputs, text+image processing, and functions/tools for advanced workflows.

item.title: gpt-oss-120b
item.description: An open-weight reasoning model (preview) for text-in/text-out workloads. It supports the Chat Completions API with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs, and can be deployed (requires a Foundry project for deployment).

item.title: gpt-oss-20b
item.description: A smaller open-weight reasoning model (preview) for text-in/text-out use cases. It supports Chat Completions with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs, and is available via managed compute and Foundry Local.

item.title: gpt-4.1
item.description: A GPT-4.1-series multimodal model with very large context support for text+image input and text output. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions).

item.title: gpt-4.1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-4.1-series multimodal model supporting text+image input and text output. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions).

item.title: gpt-4.1-nano
item.description: A compact GPT-4.1-series multimodal model supporting text+image input and text output. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions).

item.title: computer-use-preview
item.description: An experimental preview model trained for use with the Responses API computer use tool. It can control mouse and keyboard actions using screenshots as visual context, enabling UI automation scenarios with third-party libraries.

item.title: codex-mini
item.description: An o-series model fine-tuned from o4-mini for coding-oriented reasoning and tool use. It is available via the Responses API and supports structured outputs, text+image processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o3-pro
item.description: An advanced o-series reasoning model focused on high-quality problem solving for domains like science, coding, and math. It is available via the Responses API and supports structured outputs, text+image processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o4-mini
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model offering enhanced reasoning abilities with increased focus and capability. It supports both Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, text+image processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o3
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities and support for parallel tool calling. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, text+image processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o3-mini
item.description: A smaller o-series reasoning model focused on enhanced reasoning with text-only processing. It supports structured outputs and functions/tools for efficient reasoning workloads.

item.title: o1
item.description: An o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities and support for text+image processing. It supports structured outputs and functions/tools for problem-solving tasks.

item.title: o1-preview
item.description: An older preview version in the o1 series. It is available only to customers who were granted access as part of the original limited access program.

item.title: o1-mini
item.description: A faster and more cost-efficient o1-series option, positioned as ideal for coding tasks requiring speed and lower resource use. Global Standard deployment is available by default, while standard (regional) deployments are limited to select customers from the original limited access release.

item.title: gpt-4o
item.description: A multimodal GPT-4o (Omni) model that unifies text and image understanding for improved responsiveness and accuracy. It supports structured outputs, JSON mode, and parallel function calling, with strong performance in non-English languages and vision tasks.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini
item.description: A fast and inexpensive multimodal model intended as a capable replacement for GPT-3.5 Turbo series models. It supports text+image processing, JSON mode, and parallel function calling.

item.title: gpt-4 (turbo-2024-04-09)
item.description: GPT-4 Turbo with Vision is a generally available model used with the Chat Completions API. It replaces earlier GPT-4 preview models (vision-preview, 1106-Preview, 0125-Preview), with feature availability varying by input method and deployment type.

item.title: text-embedding-3-large
item.description: The latest and most capable embeddings model for converting text into vectors for similarity and retrieval. It improves multilingual retrieval performance and supports a dimensions parameter to reduce embedding size for cost/performance control.

item.title: text-embedding-3-small
item.description: A third-generation embeddings model for text-to-vector conversion with improved multilingual retrieval compared to earlier models. It supports reducing embedding size via the dimensions parameter for cost/performance tuning.

item.title: text-embedding-ada-002
item.description: A legacy embeddings model for converting text into vectors for similarity search and retrieval. The documentation notes you cannot upgrade between embeddings models; migrating to newer embeddings requires regenerating embeddings.

item.title: gpt-image-1
item.description: A GPT-image-1 series image generation model that creates images from text prompts and supports limited access preview. Access requires registration and eligibility approval, and deployments are available in select Global Standard regions.

item.title: gpt-image-1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-image-1 series image generation model in limited access preview. Access requires registration and eligibility approval, and it is available in select Global Standard regions.

item.title: gpt-image-1.5
item.description: A GPT-image-1 series image generation model in limited access preview. Access requires registration and eligibility approval, and it is available in select Global Standard regions.

item.title: dall-e-3
item.description: An image generation model that produces original images from natural language prompts. DALL-E 3 is generally available for use with REST APIs, while some SDK usage scenarios are in preview.

item.title: sora
item.description: An OpenAI video generation model that creates realistic and imaginative video scenes from text instructions. It is in preview and available in Global Standard deployments in East US 2 and Sweden Central.

item.title: sora-2
item.description: A newer Sora video generation model that creates video scenes from text instructions. It is in preview and available in Global Standard deployments in East US 2 and Sweden Central.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family preview audio model for audio and text generation. It supports large token input and is intended for conversational or generative audio scenarios, but preview models are not recommended for production.

item.title: gpt-4o-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family preview audio model for audio and text generation. It supports large token input and is intended for conversational or generative audio scenarios, but preview models are not recommended for production.

item.title: gpt-4o-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family preview model for real-time audio processing. It is designed for low-latency audio interactions and supports real-time streaming-style scenarios, but preview models are not recommended for production.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o mini-family preview model for real-time audio processing. It supports low-latency audio interactions for conversational experiences, but preview models are not recommended for production.

item.title: gpt-realtime
item.description: A generally available (GA) audio model for real-time audio processing. It is part of the newer audio model lineup alongside gpt-audio and mini variants for real-time and audio workloads.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini
item.description: A smaller real-time audio model intended for efficient, low-latency audio processing. It appears in multiple versions, including a dated variant, to support evolving capabilities and lifecycle management.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned variant of gpt-realtime-mini for real-time audio processing. It provides a pinned model version option for deployments that need consistent behavior over time.

item.title: gpt-audio
item.description: An audio model for real-time audio processing in the newer audio lineup. It is listed alongside gpt-realtime and mini variants to support audio-centric applications.

item.title: gpt-audio-mini
item.description: A smaller audio model for real-time audio processing intended for efficiency. It appears in multiple versions, including a dated variant, to support version pinning and upgrades.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o for transcription via the /audio API. It supports up to 25 MB audio file uploads for transcription requests.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o mini for transcription via the /audio API. It supports up to 25 MB audio file uploads for transcription requests.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize
item.description: A speech-to-text model that adds diarization/automatic speech recognition capabilities. It supports up to 25 MB audio file uploads for transcription requests.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned speech-to-text model with improved transcription accuracy and robustness. It supports up to 25 MB audio file uploads and provides a pinned version for consistent results.

item.title: whisper
item.description: A general-purpose speech recognition model available via the /audio API for speech-to-text and translation. It supports up to 25 MB audio file uploads per request.

item.title: tts
item.description: A preview text-to-speech model optimized for speed. It is available via the /audio API for generating speech from text.

item.title: tts-hd
item.description: A preview text-to-speech model optimized for quality. It is available via the /audio API for higher-fidelity speech generation from text.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts
item.description: A preview text-to-speech model powered by GPT-4o mini that supports style/tone guidance. It is available via the /audio API for controllable speech generation.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned preview text-to-speech model powered by GPT-4o mini that supports style/tone guidance. The dated version enables version pinning for consistent voice behavior over time.

item.title: model-router
item.description: A Microsoft model that routes requests to an underlying model based on the prompt and capabilities needed. It supports text and image input with text output, a 200,000-token context window, and has multiple available versions (including 2025-11-18).

item.title: o3-deep-research
item.description: A specialized o-series model intended for deep research workflows. It is currently only available with Foundry Agent Service, per the documentation note.

item.title: FLUX.2-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs image generation and editing model that accepts both text and multiple reference images (up to 8 via API). Key features include multi-reference support, more grounded outputs, greater flexibility, and enhanced performance, available through the BFL provider API.

item.title: FLUX.1-Kontext-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs in-context image generation and editing model focused on character consistency and advanced editing. It can be used via Azure OpenAI image endpoints and the BFL provider API (preview api-version).

item.title: FLUX-1.1-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs text-to-image model emphasizing fast inference, strong prompt adherence, competitive pricing, and scalable generation. It is available via Azure OpenAI image generation endpoints and the BFL provider API (preview api-version).

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-pro
item.description: A Cohere reranking/text-classification model for ordering documents by relevance. It returns JSON and supports many languages, and is available via Global Standard and managed compute deployments.

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-fast
item.description: A faster Cohere reranking/text-classification model for relevance ranking. It returns JSON, supports many languages, and is available via Global Standard and managed compute deployments.

item.title: Cohere-command-a
item.description: A Cohere chat-completion model optimized for tasks like reasoning, summarization, and question answering. It supports tool calling and can return either text or JSON, and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: embed-v-4-0
item.description: A Cohere embeddings model that can embed both text and images into vectors with selectable output dimensions. It supports multiple languages and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2-Speciale
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model that includes reasoning content and is optimized for step-by-step reasoning. It supports English and Chinese, returns text/JSON, and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with reasoning content for language, scientific reasoning, and coding tasks. It supports English and Chinese, returns text/JSON, and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.1
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with reasoning content and tool calling support. It supports English and Chinese, returns text/JSON, and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-R1-0528
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning model (chat-completion with reasoning content) designed for strong step-by-step reasoning. It is available in both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3-0324
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with tool calling support for advanced workflows. It supports English and Chinese, returns text/JSON, and is available in Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-R1
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning model (chat-completion with reasoning content) built for strong reasoning tasks. It is available in Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed across all regions.

item.title: Llama-4-Maverick-17B-128E-Instruct-FP8
item.description: A Meta multimodal chat-completion model that accepts text and images with very large context limits. It supports multiple languages and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct
item.description: A Meta chat-completion model for instruction-following with a large context window. It supports multiple languages and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: MAI-DS-R1
item.description: A Microsoft reasoning model (chat-completion with reasoning content) supporting very large input and output token limits. It supports English and Chinese and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: mistral-document-ai-2512
item.description: A Mistral Image-to-Text model for extracting text from images or PDF pages (up to 30 pages / 30MB). It returns text/JSON/Markdown and is available in Global Standard across all regions, with Data Zone Standard availability in US and EU.

item.title: mistral-document-ai-2505
item.description: A Mistral Image-to-Text model for OCR-like extraction from images or PDFs (up to 30 pages / 30MB). It returns text/JSON/Markdown and is available in Global Standard across all regions, with Data Zone Standard availability in US and EU.

item.title: Mistral-Large-3
item.description: A Mistral multimodal chat-completion model supporting text and image input with tool calling. It supports multiple languages and is available in Global Standard in West US 3.

item.title: Kimi-K2.5
item.description: A Moonshot AI multimodal reasoning model (chat-completion with reasoning content) that accepts text and image input. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: Kimi-K2-Thinking
item.description: A Moonshot AI reasoning model (chat-completion with reasoning content) positioned as the most capable open-source thinking model in this lineup. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: grok-4
item.description: An xAI Grok chat-completion model designed for enterprise use cases like extraction, coding, summarization, and agentic applications. It supports tool calling and requires registration for access.

item.title: grok-4-fast-reasoning
item.description: An xAI Grok model variant for fast reasoning with text+image input and large outputs. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard across all regions, with Data Zone Standard availability in the US.

item.title: grok-4-fast-non-reasoning
item.description: An xAI Grok model variant for fast non-reasoning workloads with text+image input and large outputs. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard across all regions, with Data Zone Standard availability in the US.

item.title: grok-code-fast-1
item.description: An xAI Grok model optimized for coding-oriented chat-completion workloads. It supports tool calling and requires registration for access.

item.title: grok-3
item.description: An xAI Grok chat-completion model supporting tool calling and very large outputs. It is available in Global Standard across all regions, with Data Zone Standard availability in the US.

item.title: grok-3-mini
item.description: A smaller xAI Grok chat-completion model supporting tool calling and very large outputs. It is available in Global Standard across all regions, with Data Zone Standard availability in the US.

item.title: Ministral-3B (preview) (2411)
item.description: A preview Mistral-family model listed for fine-tuning with global training support. Standard regions are not supported, and output/training example context details are listed as unknown in the fine-tuning table.

item.title: Qwen-32B (preview)
item.description: A preview model listed for fine-tuning with global training support. Standard regions are not supported, and it is described as a text-to-text model with an 8,000-token input and 32,000-token output for fine-tuning requests.
